name: Audiobook Reader
description: Comprehensive audiobook player with book management, chapter navigation, bookmarking, and reading progress tracking

tools.name: play_audiobook
tools.description: Play a specific audiobook by title, author, or search query

query.description: Book title, author, or search query (e.g., "1984", "George Orwell", "dystopian fiction")

tools.name: play_chapter
tools.description: Play a specific chapter of the current audiobook

book_title.description: Optional: Book title if not currently loaded

tools.name: control_playback
tools.description: Control audiobook playback (play, pause, stop, next chapter, previous chapter, speed, seek)

value.description: For speed: 0.5-3.0, for seek: position in seconds

tools.name: search_audiobooks
tools.description: Search for audiobooks by title, author, genre, or keywords

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return

tools.name: get_current_book
tools.description: Get information about the currently playing audiobook and reading progress

tools.name: add_bookmark
tools.description: Add a bookmark at the current position or specific time

position.description: Optional: Position in seconds (if not provided, uses current position)

tools.name: list_bookmarks
tools.description: List all bookmarks for the current audiobook

book_title.description: Optional: Book title (if not provided, uses current book)

tools.name: set_reading_speed
tools.description: Set the playback speed for audiobook reading

speed.description: Playback speed (0.5 = half speed, 1.0 = normal, 2.0 = double speed, max 3.0)

tools.name: get_reading_progress
tools.description: Get detailed reading progress and statistics

book_title.description: Optional: Book title (if not provided, uses current book)

tools.name: create_reading_list
tools.description: Create a reading list with multiple audiobooks

books.description: Array of book titles or search queries

examples.response: Calling play_audiobook with { query: '1984', author: 'George Orwell' }
Calling create_reading_list with { name: 'Sci-Fi Collection', books: ['Dune', 'Foundation', 'The Martian'] }
